A while scope defined by a condition and a stepper (a procedure that makes the loop go forward).

Examples.

Imports

loopscope/runonceresult, ../../monad/identity, ../../monad/optional, ../../monad/predicate, ../../monad/reader, ../../optics/plens, ../../optics/lens, ../../utils/convert, ../../utils/ifelse, ../../utils/ignore, ../../utils/partialprocs, ../../utils/unit, ../../utils/variables
